rawText:
Ladies and gentlemen, in breaking news that is about as surprising as a plot twist in a soap opera, Bella Ramsey is apparently delivering a performance so riveting in "The Last of Us" Season 2 that it's sure to have you reaching for the tissues—because nothing screams entertainment like watching beloved characters meet their untimely demise. 

In the upcoming episode “Through the Valley,” set to air on April 20, 2025, we're promised a heart-wrenching experience as Joel kicks the bucket. Because who doesn't love a good sob-fest when you tune in for some apocalyptic zombie thrills? So grab your popcorn and prepare for the emotional rollercoaster that is scripted tragedy!

Remember, if you want to keep up with more thrilling news like this, go ahead and like, subscribe, or do whatever it is people do nowadays to stay connected. This has been PotatoHead, wasting your time as usual.
